snippet: Mitt Romney, speaking by satellite to Aipac, said that as president he would impose "crippling sanctions" on Iran, station carriers and warships "at Iran's door," and suspend all diplomatic relations.
abstract: Mitt Romney, speaking by satellite to Aipac, said that as president he would impose "crippling sanctions" on Iran, station carriers and warships "at Iran's door," and suspend all diplomatic relations.

headline.main: 'Hope Is Not a Foreign Policy,' Romney Says
